name: Weed Funny Game
description:
A funny marijuana and weed game, u can smoke, u get stronger, get money and buy new weed!
You're working for the weed Factory, and you're job is to cut the buds
Gain money, and buy new awsome powers, and get stuff for you're room!
high level of pots and weed graphics.
Get ur weed work place bigger, get achivements, cut and smoke!
but be carefull not to make ur boss angry, he will be hard on u, but when u do ur work right all good, ull get rewarded good if u do ur job correctly, u get funny achivements and videos, u get money and find the hidden power of the weed/marijuana get stronger and have special powers!
